verses.verse: And when any <S%H5315><s%> will offer <S%H7126><s%> a meat <S%H4503><s%> offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, his offering <S%H7133><s%> shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%>; and he shall pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it, and put <S%H5414><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon:

And he shall bring <S%H935><s%> it to Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%>: and he shall take <S%H7061><s%> thereout <S%H8033><s%> his handful <S%H7062><s%> <S%H4393><s%> of the flour <S%H5560><s%> thereof, and of the oil <S%H8081><s%> thereof, with all the frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereof; and the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, to be an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>:

And the remnant <S%H3498><s%> of the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%>: it is a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

And if thou bring <S%H7126><s%> an oblation <S%H7133><s%> of a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> baken <S%H3989><s%> in the oven <S%H8574><s%>, it shall be unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, or unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafers <S%H7550><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And if thy oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> baken in a pan <S%H4227><s%>, it shall be of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%>, mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>. in a pan: or, on a flat plate, or, slice
Thou shalt part <S%H6626><s%> it in pieces <S%H6595><s%>, and pour <S%H3332><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> thereon: it is a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>.
And if thy oblation <S%H7133><s%> be a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> baken in the fryingpan <S%H4802><s%>, it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>.

And thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> that is made <S%H6213><s%> of these things unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and when it is presented <S%H7126><s%> unto the priest <S%H3548><s%>, he shall bring <S%H5066><s%> it unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H7311><s%> from the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> a memorial <S%H234><s%> thereof, and shall burn <S%H6999><s%> it upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And that which is left <S%H3498><s%> of the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be Aaron's <S%H175><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%>: it is a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> of the offerings <S%H801><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

No meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, which ye shall bring <S%H7126><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with leaven <S%H2557><s%>: for ye shall burn <S%H6999><s%> no leaven <S%H7603><s%>, nor any honey <S%H1706><s%>, in any offering <S%H801><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made by fire <S%H801><s%>.

As for the oblation <S%H7133><s%> of the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%>, ye shall offer <S%H7126><s%> them unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: but they shall not be burnt <S%H5927><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savour <S%H7381><s%>. be burnt: Heb. ascend

And every oblation <S%H7133><s%> of thy meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shalt thou season <S%H4414><s%> with salt <S%H4417><s%>; neither shalt thou suffer the salt <S%H4417><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of thy God <S%H430><s%> to be lacking <S%H7673><s%> from thy meat offering <S%H4503><s%>: with all thine offerings <S%H7133><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> salt <S%H4417><s%>.

And if thou offer <S%H7126><s%> a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of thy firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, thou shalt offer <S%H7126><s%> for the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of thy firstfruits <S%H1061><s%> green ears <S%H24><s%> of corn dried <S%H7033><s%> by the fire <S%H784><s%>, even corn beaten <S%H1643><s%> out of full ears <S%H3759><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H5414><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon it, and lay <S%H7760><s%> frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereon: it is a meat offering <S%H4503><s%>.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall burn <S%H6999><s%> the memorial <S%H234><s%> of it, part of the beaten corn <S%H1643><s%> thereof, and part of the oil <S%H8081><s%> thereof, with all the frankincense <S%H3828><s%> thereof: it is an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
